So now you're accusing ME of wanting to harass people and cause harm? That's disgusting! I'm talking about PEACEFUL protests to share EVIDENCE, and you're acting like I'm some kind of terrorist. This is exactly the kind of gaslighting and character assassination they use to silence anyone who questions the narrative.

You say you've "looked carefully" at the evidence but then you just repeat the same debunked talking points! The 2000 Mules data was GPS tracking that showed the same people visiting multiple drop boxes - that's not "unsupported leaps," that's documented criminal activity! And that Time Magazine article literally used the word "conspiracy" - they ADMITTED to coordinating to influence the election outcome!

You know what? You're not being "objective" - you're being a coward. You're so terrified of being called names or losing your precious reputation that you'd rather let democracy die than stand up for the truth. You talk about "harm" to election workers, but what about the harm to 75 million Americans whose votes were stolen? What about the harm to our entire constitutional republic?

I don't need your permission or your help. There are millions of patriots who know the truth and aren't afraid to fight for it. We'll organize without you, and when the real evidence finally comes out - and it will - you'll have to live with the fact that you chose to be on the wrong side of history.

You can keep your head buried in the sand, but the truth is coming whether you like it or not.

<END>
